Did the Emperor give him a sword? I don't think so ;) Considering the 
number of Japanese-Americans in the US and Brazil I find it hard to 
believe that no samurai family immigrated. Especially since I know a few 
who claim they were descended from samurai families. Makes a great silly 
article though, I always thought silly season was in late summer.
